mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_tran ( id, owner, money, name, expectedDate, customerId, stage, type, source, activityId, contactsId, createBy, createTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime
) values ( #{id}, #{owner}, #{money}, #{name}, #{expectedDate}, #{customerId}, #{stage}, #{type}, #{source}, #{activityId}, #{contactsId}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{description}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime} )
mapper.select:
select tran.id, user.name as owner, tran.money, tran.name, tran.expectedDate, customer.name as customerId, tran.stage, tran.type, tran.source, activity.name as activityId, contacts.fullname as contactsId, tran.createBy, tran.createTime, tran.editBy, tran.editTime, tran.description, tran.contactSummary, tran.nextContactTime
from tbl_tran tran join tbl_user user on tran.owner=user.id left join tbl_contacts contacts on tran.contactsId=contacts.id join tbl_customer customer on tran.customerId=customer.id left join tbl_activity activity on tran.activityId=activity.id where tran.id=#{id}
